### Matthijs Hollanders

Matthijs received Bachelor and Master's degrees in Biology from Wageningen University & Research, the Netherlands. A passion for quantitative methods was sparked during his PhD at Southern Cross University, Australia, where he investigated contemporary amphibian responses to the disease chytridiomycosis.
